DOC.brief_summary: Perineal massage end labor stage 2 investigate 2 randomize control trial use water soluble lubricant . In one trial significant reduction labor stage 2 found , trial show significant increase perineum integrity . In HCB Swiss Study significant reduction labor stage 2 30 % well significant increase perineal integrity show . No adverse event report . ( see also Obstetric gel shorten second stage labor prevents perineal trauma nulliparous woman : randomize control trial labor facilitation . Schaub AF , Litschgi M , Hoesli I , Holzgreve W , Bleul U , Geissbuhler V. J Perinat Med 2008 ; 36 ( 2 ) : 129-135 ) . Today 's practice- Lubricants widely use enable manual vaginal examination labor . In Israel midwife use Almond Oil perineal massage end labor stage 2 protect perineum . It show first time use Dianatal Obstetric Gel facilitate vaginal childbirth human . Dianatal introduce EU market 2008 .
